MajorClaims.Text: online classes should never replace classroom learning
the classroom learning is the best way to provide education for these reasons

Claims.Text: classroom learning is the best way to provide education comparing to online classes
It makes you perfect in time management skills
online classes have some advantages so they could be used as supplementary

Premises.Text: In the classroom environment you can learn from your classmates
if you see any of your classmates who is performing better, it will force you for making your performance more better
When I was in First Year in B Com, I was not serious in my study, but when I saw some of my friends who took better grades than me, it influenced me and I intended to do better in my subjects
I got 1st rank in final exam
in classroom learning you have to complete study work on time
you can learn by participating in group studies how to communicate with others
It makes you communication and of course your group skills better, which can help you in your future and career
professors play vital role in classroom learning, most of them are specialists is their subjects, and they help you by giving valuable information and useful skills
You can improve your skills by work under any professor; you can ask questions face to face, it will clear your doubts

For Toefl IBT Coaching first I was depend on some online courses, but after 1 month I realized that I was wasting my time so I joined an institute for preparation of Toefl IBT, and in 1 month I felt that my English skills have been improving faster
they could not be substitute of existing classroom learning
